ModMetaData.name: Avali Continued [1.2]
ModMetaData.author: Erisss, FacePlus, Ksisa, XY78
ModMetaData.description:
Adds to the game Avali race - race of small fluffy nomadic pack hunters with bad temper and a specific comfort temperature range. If you're more interested in the lore, check out the Avali wiki https://avali.fandom.com/wiki/The_Official_Avali_Wiki
C# and XML code by Erisss Graphics by FacePlus Formerly maintained by Ksisa Currently maintained by Chennex/XY78 Avali race by RyuujinZERO
The mod is an edit to the Avali mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1314474881
There are a few kinks that still need to be worked out: Some backstories have placeholder text. Lovin' does not currently happen. Small meals do not seem to ever rot.
If you run into any issues besides these, please report these on the issues page of the github here: https://github.com/Chennex/Avali-Continued/issues
If you want to join in development, hit me up.
